jobs and procedures to automate movement of data Lead QA Analyst UHaul International Phoenix AZ December 2015 to August 2016 Supervised a team of three analysts performing issue research on complex technical issues and served as primary point of contact and research for a 100 developers Performed whitebox testing and analysis on new development and performed impact analysis on existing frameworks services and applications to best utilize developer time Created dynamic TFS queries to track QA effectiveness against release iterations and generate metrics for future improvement Database Administrator August 2012 to December 2015 Administrator for MSSQL 12 servers comprising the core of company business from a 13TB data warehouse to an 18000 transactionsecond OLTP database Performed advanced indexing and optimization for the companys primary pointofsale database and server Authored advanced TSQL procedures to accommodate development needs Performed SQL monitoring to ensure smooth server operation Achieved 999 server uptime on all servers Experienced in schema usage permission inheritancechaining linked server setup backuprestore operations and automated maintenance Created WebService and database logic used to provide ondemand realtime inventory and customer management Enhanced and supported and database logic used to provide ondemand scheduling for equipment rentals at a specific time and location This service boosted rentals by 8 and doubled reservations taken on the company website Created and deployed SSIS packages to move and transform data as needed Configured SSAS services dimension tables and fact tables for construction of cubes based on business data Created and deployed dozens of SSRS reports backed by intricate data logic to serve
